title: No Loss In Promos When A Team mate Is Dc
body: Just a thought cause during my 3 promos that I have failed there was always a afk ( Don't know what happened) but I managed to climb the division eventually. However, I think we shouldn't count it as a loss if someone on the team dcs while you are on your promos

replies.body:
it sucks but thats life.

Riot already added the promo helper to make it easier to climb, i don't think you need any more chances than that.

There is also the possibility of duo'ing and if you are going to lose a promo, your mate can leave and save the game for you.
This idea would never work.
